title: Nutrition: the all-American meal
creator_credit: Barr Films and William C. Crain
brief_description: Analyses the nutritional and sociological implications of the “hamburger, chips and soft drink American diet.” Offers suggestions for improving the nutritional value of meals.
description: Analyses the nutritional and sociological implications of the “hamburger, chips and soft drink American diet.” Offers suggestions for improving the nutritional value of meals.
